text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump FACT CHECK - not true -- per capita

Germany has tested 20,629 per million people 

USA has tested only 9,947 per million people

Check  data: https://t.co/CTamLqtPMo

The United States has now conducted more than 3.3 million tests, FAR MORE than any other country in the world.
